text: Maria Alice Monteiro de Campos Vergueiro (January 19, 1935 – June 3, 2020) was a Brazilian actress and theatre director. She was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Her best known roles were as Delegado's wife in O Corpo (1991) and as Motorista in Cronicamente Inviável (2000). Vergueiro died on June 3, 2020 at a hospital in São Paulo from pneumonia, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from São Paulo Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Brazilian theatre directors
title: Maria Alice Vergueiro
